goal.tools.mc.property.ltl

Class Formula

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.property.ltl.Formula
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Conjunction, Disjunction, False, Negation, Next, Proposition, Release, True, Until

    public abstract class Formula
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an LTL formula. This class should not be used on its own (except for its static methods), but rather should be extended for more specific (temporal) operators.
    Author:
    sungshik

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Formula()

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract LMHashSet<Formula> getArgs()
      Get all arguments of this formula.
      LMHashSet<Proposition> getPropositions()
      Gets all propositions occurring in this formula, by recursively calling this method on its arguments.
      int hashCode() 
      static LMHashSet<Formula> literals(LMHashSet<Formula> set)
      Returns the literals that occur in the specified set.
      static LMHashSet<Formula> nextArgs(LMHashSet<Formula> set)
      Returns a set of formulas containing the arguments of all the next formulas in the specified set
      Formula nnf()
      Converts this formula to negation normal form.
      static Formula parse(java.lang.String s)
      Parses the specified string to an LTL formula, using the specified parser for propositions (this could be null).
      LMHashSet<Until> untils()
      Returns all the until formulas that are sub-formulas of this formula.

        public abstract LMHashSet<Formula> getArgs()
        Get all arguments of this formula.
        Returns:
        The arguments.

      • getPropositions

        public LMHashSet<Proposition> getPropositions()
        Gets all propositions occurring in this formula, by recursively calling this method on its arguments.
        Returns:
        The propositions ocurring in this formula.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object

      • literals

        public static LMHashSet<Formula> literals(LMHashSet<Formula> set)
        Returns the literals that occur in the specified set. Assumes the formulas in the specified set are in NNF such that negations occur only before propositions.
        Parameters:
        set - - The formulas to extract the literals from.
        Returns:
        The literals.

      • nextArgs

        public static LMHashSet<Formula> nextArgs(LMHashSet<Formula> set)
        Returns a set of formulas containing the arguments of all the next formulas in the specified set
        Parameters:
        set - - The formulas to extract the arguments from.
        Returns:
        The arguments of next formulas.

      • nnf

        public Formula nnf()
        Converts this formula to negation normal form.
        Returns:
        The NNF of this formula.

      • parse

        public static Formula parse(java.lang.String s)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            org.antlr.runtime.RecognitionException,
                            ParserException,
                            KRInitFailedException
        Parses the specified string to an LTL formula, using the specified parser for propositions (this could be null).
        Parameters:
        s - - The string to be parsed.
        pp - - The PropositionParser to be used. If null, all propositions are regarded as strings.
        Returns:
        The parsed string.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.antlr.runtime.RecognitionException
        ParseException
        KRInitFailedException
        ParserException

      • untils

        public LMHashSet<Until> untils()
        Returns all the until formulas that are sub-formulas of this formula. Works by recursively calling this method on this' arguments.
        Returns:
        The until formulas.
